text: @realDonaldTrump @Twitter @WhiteHouse @GOP aww Donnie is having a tantrum. Twitter is mean to him. They have standards EVERYONE should have to follow. It's their show if he doesn't like it he can delete his account. What does he think he is a KING?   #coronavirus #Trump100K #Trump #TrumpDeathToll100K
